welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tajumulco, a charming city nestled in the highlands of Guatemala known for its beautiful landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tapachula International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
